name: Google Docs Dark Mode 2019
description: Dark mode for Google Docs (document mode only). Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/162635/google-docs-dark-mode-by-dkudriavtsev, fixed in some areas as of September 2019, but not everything. Good enough for my purposes. No guarantees.
additional_info:
Credits: Dmitry Kudriavtsev (https://userstyles.org/users/636163) for original.

Don't go complaining it doesn't work or is broken in some area. It's either because I've not updated this, or it's because I don't use that so never noticed, or simply don't care.

If you keep complaining, it's definitely the latter then.

And, yes, images get inverted. If you don't want that, just edit the style.
